# synchronize()

**Instance Method**

Waits for any pending asynchronous updates to the defaults database and returns; this method is unnecessary and shouldn’t be used.

## Declaration

```swift
func synchronize() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the data was saved successfully to disk, otherwise [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Related Documentation

- **removePersistentDomain(forName:)**: Removes the keys and values from the specified persistent domain.
- **persistentDomain(forName:)**: Retrieves the settings from the specified persistent domain.
- **setPersistentDomain(_:forName:)**: Replaces the keys and values in the specified domain with the new keys and values you supply.

## Deprecated

- **init(user:)**: Creates a user defaults object initialized with the defaults for the specified user account.
- **resetStandardUserDefaults()**: This method has no effect and shouldn’t be used.
- **persistentDomainNames()**: Returns an array of the current persistent domain names.
- **completedInitialCloudSyncNotification**: Posted when ubiquitous defaults finish downloading data, either the first time a device is connected to an iCloud account or when a user switches their primary iCloud account.
- **didChangeCloudAccountsNotification**: Posted when the user changes the primary iCloud account.
- **noCloudAccountNotification**: Posted when a cloud default is set, but no iCloud user is logged in.
- **Language-Dependent Information Constants**: These constants are deprecated and shouldn’t be used.
